TopicTitle: Make the the heaviest 4 engined seaplane and

Articles.Content:
land it on water, then take off from the water again, and see how far you can get before having to land.(Anywhere)

Rules

1 - No more than 4 engines, lower numbers may be used however.

2 - No RCS.

3 - No Infinity glide glitch

4 - Mods are allowed apart from parts specifically designed for the task.(B9 would be allowed, but ones that give specific parts ment FOR hydroplanes are not allowed.)

5 - Crashlanding does not count(Im looking at you Jeb)

6 - You are allowed more stages, but the count most remain under 4 engines on the entire ship in accordance to rule 1.

7 - Sub orbital is allowed, but going full orbital is disqualification.

8 - Ferram aerospace is not needed but is highly recommended, however if you choose not to use it, you will lose 10 points.

9 - You have to land in the water at some point in your journey, this can be the final resting place of your aircraft or at the immediate start. But you may not roll it down from the runway into the water, then take off.

10 - No parachutes.

Scoring system.

For every 1,000 meters you manage to go upwards, you gain 1 point.

For every 5,000 meters you go forwards you gain 1 point.

Flying around the world earns you 10 points.(Stacks, so flying around twice gives 20 points and flying around 3 times gives 30)

For every Ton your aircraft weighs, you gain 1 point.
